titleStmt.title: Eikōn vasilikē, or, An image royal, &c. March 25.
titleStmt.author: Oxinden, Henry, 1609-1670.

notesStmt.note: Laudatory verses, prelim. p. [3]-[5], addressed to Henry Oxinden.
Celebrating the marriage of Basil Dixwell and Dorothy Peyton.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
